H0.text: In Shakespeare’s play what is the name of Hamlet’s mother. Ophelia

H1.text: In Shakespeare’s play what is the name of Hamlet’s mother. Lady Macbeth

H2.text: In Shakespeare’s play what is the name of Hamlet’s mother. Cordelia

H3.text: In Shakespeare’s play what is the name of Hamlet’s mother. Gertrud

A4.text: Gertrude is Hamlet's mother and Queen of Denmark.

A5.text: Ophelia is the daughter of Polonius, not Hamlet's mother.

A6.text: Gertrude is the queen of Denmark and Hamlet's mother.
